sentence.Network_en: Their father's possessions were inequitably divided among the sons.
sentence.Network_cn: 父亲的财产没有平分给几个儿子.

sentence.Network_en: People who feel inequitably treated and dissatisfied are motivated to do something to restore equity.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些觉得受到不公平对待和不满的人,会作一些事去恢复公平.
